unitControlModule.stateFactories.actions.executableActions.steering

Class SteeringFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • unitControlModule.stateFactories.actions.executableActions.steering.SteeringFactory

  • public class SteeringFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    SteeringFactory.java --- Factory for generating the final version of a steering Vector. The factory consists of various functions of which the main one (transformSteeringVector(IGoapUnit, Vector, Polygon, Chokepoint, double, double)) transforms a steering Vector in a way in which it's end Position is located inside the accessible map.
    Author:
    P H - 30.06.2017

    • Method Detail

      • transformSteeringVector

        public static Vector transformSteeringVector(javaGOAP.IGoapUnit goapUnit,
                                             Vector generalizedTargetVector,
                                             Polygon currentPolygon,
                                             bwta.Chokepoint nearestChoke,
                                             double toalRetreatDistance,
                                             double turnRadius)
        Function for generating a steering Vector based on a generalized Vector which holds all necessary directions to all predefined important locations. This function returns a Vector which lies inside the accessible map space and follows the map's borders if necessary. If the boundaries are being met, the function will create two new Vectors, one pointing X degrees to the left and one pointing X degrees to the right, which in return are getting checked. This continues until either X >= 180 or one Vector is not intersecting with the map's boundaries and therefore can be followed by the Unit. The Vector parameter holds all necessary information regarding the direction the Unit is initially looking.
        Parameters:
        goapUnit - the Unit from whose Position the Vectors are being casted.
        generalizedTargetVector - the Vector which holds all necessary direction information that are being resembled.
        currentPolygon - the Polygon the Unit is currently in.
        nearestChoke - the closest ChokePoint to the Unit.
        toalRetreatDistance - the total length the generated Vector will have.
        turnRadius - the turn radius in degrees that each Vector will be turned in one single iteration.
        Returns:
        a Vector to which's end-Position the Unit can retreat to.

      • doesOneIntersectionBelongToChokePoint

        private static boolean doesOneIntersectionBelongToChokePoint(bwta.Chokepoint chokePoint,
                                                             java.util.List<bwapi.Pair<Line,Point>> intersections)
        Function for determining if any intersection of a List of provided intersections belongs to a ChokePoint.
        Parameters:
        chokePoint - the ChokePoint that is going to be tested.
        intersections - the intersections from which at least one must belong to the provided ChokePoint.
        Returns:
        true or false depending if one of the intersections belongs to the provided ChokePoint.

      • doesIntersectionBelongToChokePoint

                                                          bwapi.Pair<Line,Point> intersection)
        Function for determining if an intersection belongs to a ChokePoint.
        Parameters:
        chokePoint - the ChokePoint that the intersection is going to be tested against.
        intersection - the intersection that is going to be tested against the provided ChokePoint.
        Returns:
        true or false depending if the intersection belongs to the provided ChokePoint.
